com.ibm.lpex.alef.contentassist.IContextInformation

Packages that use IContextInformation
com.ibm.lpex.alef.contentassist This package is a copy of package org.eclipse.jface.text.contentassist modified for use with LPEX.

 class ContextInformation
          A default implementation of the IContextInformation interface.
